title: Ethereum feature abused to steal $60 million from 99K victims
description: Malicious actors have been abusing Ethereum's 'Create2' function to bypass wallet security alerts and poison cryptocurrency addresses, which led to stealing $60,000,000 worth of cryptocurrency from 99,000 people in six months. [...]

title: FBI: Royal ransomware asked 350 victims to pay $275 million
description: The FBI and CISA revealed in a joint advisory that the Royal ransomware gang has breached the networks of at least 350 organizations worldwide since September 2022. [...]

title: DP World cyberattack blocks thousands of containers in ports
description: A cyberattack on international logistics firm DP World Australia has severely disrupted the regular freight movement in multiple large Australian ports. [...]

title: CISA warns of actively exploited Juniper pre-auth RCE exploit chain
description: CISA warned federal agencies today to secure Juniper devices on their networks by Friday against four vulnerabilities now used in remote code execution (RCE) attacks as part of a pre-auth exploit chain. [...]

title: Israel warns of BiBi wiper attacks targeting Linux and Windows
description: Security researchers found a Windows equivalent for the recently discovered BiBi-Linux, a data-wiping malware used in attacks to destroy data on systems at Israeli companies. [...]

title: Criminal IP & Cisco SecureX/XDR: Enhanced Cyber Threat Analysis
description: The Criminal IP threat intelligence search engine by AI SPERA has recently integrated with Cisco SecureX/XDR, empowering organizations to stay ahead of malicious actors. Learn more about this integration from Criminal IP in this article. [...]
